title: BRIEF-ISS Says It Recommends Wells Fargo Shareholders Vote For All Board Nominees At Annual Meeting‍​
text:
April 7, 2018 / 1:21 AM / Updated 14 hours ago BRIEF-ISS Says It Recommends Wells Fargo Shareholders Vote For All Board Nominees At Annual Meeting‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 7 (Reuters) - 
* PROXY ADVISORY FIRM ISS SAYS IT RECOMMENDS WELLS FARGO SHAREHOLDERS VOTE FOR ALL WELLS FARGO BOARD NOMINEES AT ANNUAL MEETING‍​ 
* PROXY ADVISORY FIRM ISS RECOMMENDS WELLS FARGO SHAREHOLDERS VOTING FOR PROPOSAL TO REDUCE OWNERSHIP THRESHOLD FOR SHAREHOLDERS TO CALL SPECIAL MEETING 
* ISS ALSO RECOMMENDS WELLS FARGO SHAREHOLDERS VOTE AGAINST REFORM EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION POLICY WITH SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY 
* ISS SAYS “CAUTIONARY SUPPORT” FOR INCUMBENT NOMINEES – ON WELLS FARGO BOARD PRIOR TO 2017 – IS WARRANTED, WHILE SUPPORT FOR ALL NEW NOMINEES IS WARRANTED 
* ISS SUGGESTS WELLS FARGO SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE FOR REPORT ON INCENTIVE BASED COMPENSATION AND RISKS OF MATERIAL LOSSES Further company coverage:
